title: Rock Star's Curvy Christmas
description: An over the top older alpha man younger curvy woman Christmas romance from the Queen of Curves!Tyler & Delilah's Christmas Love story <3I'm back in Chicagofor a Christmas concert.My best friend shows upwith his younger sister.Delilah has changed a lot,that's for sure. She's so beautiful,and I have to be with her.I'll do anything to show herthat she's my beautiful bliss.No one will stand in the wayof our love. Not even my best friend.Delilah:He's a handsome rock star now,and I crave a chance to be near him.But I know I'm not Tyler's type.I'm not like the models he usually dates.I'm just me. But for some reason,when he sees me at his concert,Tyler wants me and only me.But he's my brother's best friendand his fans can be very jealous.Should I give myself to Tylerand stand up to anyonewho thinks I shouldn't havemy Christmas miracle?
author: Sara Hazel
